scripts.update: npm run npmconf && npx npm-check-updates -u && npm i
scripts.npmconf: rm -f .npmrc && aws codeartifact login --tool npm --repository failean --domain failean --domain-owner 988253048728 --region us-east-1 && npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm config set @failean:registry https://failean-988253048728.d.codeartifact.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/npm/failean/
scripts.prod: npm run update:prod && npm run build
scripts.docker: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && CODEARTIFACT_TOKEN=$(aws codeartifact get-authorization-token --domain failean --domain-owner 988253048728 --query authorizationToken --output text) && docker build --build-arg CODEARTIFACT_TOKEN=$CODEARTIFACT_TOKEN -t 988253048728.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/ocserver:$VERSION .
scripts.dev:fullclean: npm run clean:all && npm run dev:fullfast
scripts.dev:fullfast: npm run update && npm run dev:fast
